channel.title: GitHub on Peter's Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in GitHub on Peter's Notebook

item.title: GitHub Pages Publish
item.description: GitHub pages allow a GitHub repository to function as a web-server thing. Certain branches can be marked as the source for a static webserver … and more? … whatevs; I’m not worried about “more” so here’s how to dump a static website into a GitHub repo … create/find a repository on GitHub I created game-SpaceShips at git@github.com:g-pechorin/game-SpaceShips.git clone it git clone git@github.com:g-pechorin/game-SpaceShips.git overwrite the source contents (but not the .

item.title: Pushing (from GoGS) with `post-receive` (to a mirror)
item.description: I have a GoGS server for my work. I want to back it up off-site to our GitLab instance. According to a document I read this should be possible using post-receive hooks.
